strings.languageMessage: Note: See available languages with {command}, and set language with {command} <language code>.
strings.discordDMs: Please check your DMs for a response.
strings.matrixStartMessage:
Hi
Enter the below PIN in the Jellyfin sign-up page to verify your account.
strings.discordStartMessage:
Hi!
 Enter your PIN with `/pin <PIN>` to verify your account.
strings.invalidPIN: That PIN was invalid, try again.
strings.pinSuccess: Success! You can now return to the sign-up page.
strings.languageMessageDiscord: Note: set your language with /lang <language name>.
